Key Match Events: Houston Rockets guard Amen Thompson threw Miami Heat star Tyler Herro to the hardwood during an intense altercation.
The altercation happened with just over 30 seconds left in the Heat's 104-100 road win over the Rockets.
The incident resulted in a scuffle breaking out on the court involving players and coaches from both teams.
Four ejections for Houston: Amen Thompson, Jalen Green, coach Ime Udoka, and assistant Ben Sullivan.
Two ejections for the Heat: Tyler Herro and Terry Rozier.
Post-Match Reflections: Tyler Herro commented on the altercation, initially attributing it to the physical nature of the sport before making a remark about his performance.
